providerid.description: The ID to be used for this provider. Note that in athenaNet, an individual provider (as defined by a unique NPI) may have multiple provider IDs. For the API, we have collapsed these to a single canonical ID. For updates and deletes, this will be either 1 or -1 depending on success or failure.

errorreason.description: Error message if the operation did not work.

alertmessage.description: Alert message if the operation did not work.
